title: White House Seeks Ways To Go It Alone In Keeping Companies Stateside
teaser: The Obama administration is exploring ways to prevent U.S. businesses from relocating abroad to save money on taxes. Treasury Secretary Jack Lew indicated that Congress would need to act, but now the administration says it is looking for ways to act on its own.
